about.title: NO ESCAPE
about.description1: Face The Wall is a young Death/Thrash metal band forged in Slovakia’s underground in 2022. Their sound is a violent collision of fast technical riffs, relentless drums and searing melodic solos – sharpened with themes of death, gore, beer and radiation.
about.description2: This is not your typical metal act. This is four obsessed minds unleashing controlled chaos:
about.description3: Leo Medveď – vocals, rhythm guitar. The voice of decay.Šimon Vician – lead guitar. Precision in madness.Michal Lamper – drums. A war machine in motion.Timotej Panuska – bass guitar. The low-end fallout.
about.description4: Face The Wall doesn’t aim to entertain. They aim to detonate.Every song is a weapon. Every show is detonation.
about.description5: This is not a concert. This is fallout.

our_music.title: OUR MUSIC
our_music.description: Experience the power and emotion of Face The Wall through our studio albums, each telling a unique story of rebellion, passion, and the metal spirit.

tour.title: TOUR DATES
tour.description: Experience the raw power of Face The Wall live. Join us on our latest tour as we bring our crushing sound to stages across the country.
